Did GAI give a reason for the authentic grade. Thanks

posts.post_title: 1887 Old Judge Cap Anson GAI Auth.  -  SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: E, Daniel
Hi Bruce,

I would hope so [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]. Unfortunately I wasn't the original submitter of the card so I'm unaware of the reason.

I purchased the card approx. 3 years ago already in its GAI slab, and upon receiving it judged the left edge to be trimmed. It's also possible a couple other edges may have been lightly trimmed, though the borders are good size all round and all advertising etc. unaffected. Card presents as a good size Old Judge.

Hope that helps.

Regards
Daniel


Edited to add extra explanation
